name: 胡憲倫
objective:
這門課除了教授傳統企業環境管理及相關實務之外，特別將著重在企業提升如何透過綠色創新來提升綠色競爭力的策略與做法；此外，課程另一重點將會是企業如何透過協助聯合國永續發展目標(UN SDGs)的達成，來創造企業的永續競爭力。學生將會深入探究金字塔底層(BOP)與創造共享價值(Creating Shared Value, CSV)之理論及實務做法，以及成為一個真正永續企業的策略。瞭解新經濟時代的特徵，以及企業如何透過環境與永續發展議題，來協助大環境的永續發展並提昇企業的競爭優勢。課堂上將會應用多個企業案例，讓學生們透過分組討論，來獲得最大的學習效果。
Students will not just learn traditional business management but also new strategies and practices for doing business in the emerging green and low carbon economy. Students will understand the characteristics and landscape of the new economy, and how to help enterprises enhance their competitiveness in response to the megatrends of sustainability. Case studies and group discussion will be adopted in the class.
schedule:
第一週 企業本質與企業管理概論(企業環保主義之興起與演進)
Week 1 Corporation and Introduction to Business Management
第二週 企業環境暨永續管理的內外趨動力(利害關係人及其影響)
Week 2 Business Environment and Internal Driving Forces for Sustainability
第三週 環境管理工具：環境管理系統、環境會計、清潔生產、綠色設計
Week 3 Environmental Management Tools- Environmental Management Systems (EMS), Environmental Accounting, Cleaner Production, Green Design
第四週 環境競爭策略理論與實務(一)：環境產品差異化與管理競爭者
Week 4 Environmental Strategies Theory and Practices (I): Environmental Products Differentiation; and Managing Competitors
第五週 環境競爭策略理論與實務(二)：降低成本與重新定義市場
Week 5 Environmental Strategies Theory and Practices (II): Reducing Costs within the Firm; and Redefining Markets
第六週 企業永續管理重點(一)：經濟面向核心議題
Week 6 Focuses of Corporate Sustainability (I)- Core Issues of Economic Aspect
第七週(Week 7) 企業永續管理重點(二)：環境面向核心議題
Week 7 Focuses of Corporate Sustainability (II)- Core Issues of Environmental Aspect
第八週(Week 8) 企業永續管理重點(三)：社會面向核心議題
Week 8 Focuses of Corporate Sustainability (III)- Core Issues of Economic Aspect
第九週(Week 9) 期中考
Week 9  Midterm
第十週(Week 10) 透明與永續資訊揭露專題－環境與永續性報告書
Week 10 Transparency and Disclosure- Non-financial/Sustainability Reporting 
第十一週(Week 11) 環境與永續風險管理專論(一)：綠色暨永續供應鏈管理
Week 11 Special Topics on Risk Management of Sustainability (I) Green and Sustainable Supply Chain
第十二週(Week 12) 環境與永續風險管理專論(二)：碳管理與氣候治理
Week 12 Special Topics on Risk Management of Sustainability (II) Carbon and Climate Governance
第十三週(Week 13) 企業倫理與企業社會責任專論－含公司治理
Week 13 Special Topic on Business Ethics and Corporate Social Responsibility
第十四週(Week 14) 企業新藍海策略專論—金字塔底層暨包容性商業及共享的價值(行銷3.0理論)
Week 14 Special Topic on the Base of the Pyramid/Inclusive Business and Shared Value- A New Business Ocean Strategy
第十五週(Week 15) 企業價值新論—環境與社會損益(Environmental and Social Profit and Loss, EP&L and SP&L)
Week 15 Special Topic on New Evaluation Methodology- Natural Capital Accounting (NCA) and Environmental and Social Profit and Loss (EP&L and SP&L)
第十六週(Week 16) 專題分組報告(一)
第十七週(Week 17) 專題分組報告(二)
第十八週(Week 18)總結&期末考
scorePolicy:
讀書報告：20%  課堂參與(含出席及提問)：10% 期中考試：15%
